clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Acupuncture on Quiescent Crohn's Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Acupuncture on Quiescent Crohn's Disease

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai Institute of Acupuncture, Moxibustion and Meridian

collaborator.agency: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: Shanghai Institute of Acupuncture, Moxibustion and Meridian

brief_summary.textblock: To observe the clinical effect of acupuncture on quiescent Crohn's disease

detailed_description.textblock: To observe the effect of acupuncture on maintaining remission of quiescent Crohn's disease

primary_outcome.description: Defined as CDAI > 150 and increased by ≥70 points or need to adjust drug to control active disease.

secondary_outcome.description: The mean duration of disease recurrence during follow-up.

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change of CDAI from baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Difference in the mean change of CDAI from baseline between groups

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change of Inflammatory Bowel Disease Questionnaire (IBDQ)
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of life assessment for Crohn's disease. The score ranges from 32 to 224, and the higher the score, the better the outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change of the Hospital anxiety and depression scale (HADS)
secondary_outcome.description: Psychological factors (Anxiety and depression) assessment for CD. The score ranges from 0 to 21, and the higher the score, the worse the outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: The mean change of Crohn's disease endoscopic index of severity (CDEIS)
secondary_outcome.description: Intestinal inflammation performance. The score ranges from 0 to 44, and the higher the score, the worse the outcome.

other_outcome.description: brain functional and structural changes reflected by fMRI
Changes in the structure and diversity of fecal microbiota detected by 16S rDNA sequencing.

arm_group.description: Receiving sham acupuncture and sham moxibustion treatment

intervention.description: Patients receiving acupuncture and mild moxibustion, whom were treated 3 times per week for 12 weeks and followed up for 36 weeks. CV12 and Bilateral ST37, SP6, SP4, LR3, KI3, LI4 and LI11 were selected for acupuncture and bilateral ST25 and ST36 were selected for moxibustion. Hwato acupuncture device was used to blind the subjects, and had the deqi sensation. The surface temperature of acupoints was maintained at 43℃± 1℃ for moxibustion.

Patients receiving sham acupuncture and sham mild moxibustion, whom were treated 3 times per week for 12 weeks and followed up for 36 weeks. CV12 and Bilateral ST37, SP6, SP4, LR3, KI3, LI4 and LI11 were selected for acupuncture and bilateral ST25 and ST36 were selected for moxibustion. Same Hwato acupuncture device was used to blind the subjects, but do not puncturing into the skin and do not have the deqi sensation. The surface temperature of acupoints was maintained at 37℃± 1℃ for moxibustion.
